Package johnny

Provides the classes required to operate the JohnnyCard system as described in the Package Specifications

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JohnnyBank The bank and account with which one or more Johnny Cards can be associated.
JohnnyCard The Johnny Card is a digital cash card is a digital cash card which uses flash filesystem to store virtual cash for connectionless point-of-sale transactions.
JohnnyMachine A terminal for using Johnny Cards.
JohnnyRegister A point-of-sale terminal through which one makes Johnny Card transactions.
 

Package johnny Description

Provides the classes required to operate the JohnnyCard system as described in the Package Specifications

Package Specification

For an the all the source files related to the specification of this project, see the please see: For BON specification see bon\ directory
